summary:
Royal Dutch Shell Experience:
Full field development planning for waterflooding
Well and Reservoir Surveillance
Pore Pressure Prediction
Resource volumes and reserves volume estimation (with SEC guidelines)
Carbonate/fractured reservoir simulation

Specialities:
Geo mechanical analysis for fracture pressure calculation from pore pressure prediction.
Waterflood simulation,
Carbonate/fractured reservoir simulation
surveillance and planning for steam flooding other EOR techniques
